channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The VIP
channel.description:
The VIP - Neutral Special
Passive: Review Resume - You know the class of anyone you hire. Day ability: Human shield - Chose someone you have hired. If you would be attacked they are instead. (3 uses) Night ability 1: Hire - Your target in addition to their previous goal now only wins if you survive. They will learn of your identity. (2 uses) Night ability 2: Interview - You learn of your targets immunity's (unlimited)
Immunity's include night immunity. Poison/bleed immunity. Convert immunity and Occupy immunity.
Goal: Survive

item.title: [Class Suggestion] The VIP
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The VIP - Neutral Special

Passive: Review Resume - You know the class of anyone you hire.
Day ability: Human shield - Chose someone you have hired. If you would be attacked they are instead. (3 uses)
Night ability 1: Hire - Your target in addition to their previous goal now only wins if you survive. They will learn of your identity. (2 uses)
Night ability 2: Interview - You learn of your targets immunity’s (unlimited)

Immunity’s include night immunity. Poison/bleed immunity. Convert immunity and Occupy immunity.

Goal: Survive
